targets.rawSql: select range_id, lease_holder, lease_holder_locality, voting_replicas, non_voting_replicas from [show ranges from table ${table} with details];

select node_id as node, address, locality, server_version as version, is_live as "is live", ranges, leases, started_at as "started at"
from crdb_internal.gossip_nodes
where locality ~ '${region:regex}'
order by locality

with regions as (
  SELECT row_number() OVER (), *
  FROM (
      select latitude, longitude, "localityValue" 
      from system.locations 
      where "localityValue" in (select region from [show regions])
        )
)
select * from regions

with regions as (
  SELECT row_number() OVER (), *
  FROM (
      select latitude, longitude, "localityValue" 
      from system.locations 
      where "localityValue" in (select region from [show regions])
        )
)
select * from regions where row_number in (1,2)

with regions as (
  SELECT row_number() OVER (), *
  FROM (
      select latitude, longitude, "localityValue" 
      from system.locations 
      where "localityValue" in (select region from [show regions])
        )
)
select * from regions where row_number in (1,3)

with regions as (
  SELECT row_number() OVER (), *
  FROM (
      select latitude, longitude, "localityValue" 
      from system.locations 
      where "localityValue" in (select region from [show regions])
        )
)
select * from regions where row_number in (2,3)
